SEARCH
Package gw.api.geocode

Class GeocodeScriptHelper

java.lang.Object
gw.api.geocode.GeocodeScriptHelper
Direct Known Subclasses:
CCGeocodeScriptHelper
public class GeocodeScriptHelper extends Object
Provides utility functions for working with Proximity Searches (Geocoding) from Gosu.

  • Method Details

    • setupUserProximitySearch

      public static UserSearchCriteria setupUserProximitySearch(Address searchCenter, Boolean isDistanceBased, Integer number)
      Sets up a proximity search on Users.
      Parameters:
      searchCenter - The location to search for proximity from, an Address
      isDistanceBased - Set for true if a distance based ("search within n miles/km") search; false for an ordinal ("nearest n") search
      number - Range in miles/km for distance based searches; number of results to be returned for an ordinal search
      Returns:
      a UserSearchCriteriaBase upon which other criteria can be set if desired

    • setupUserProximitySearch

      public static UserSearchCriteria setupUserProximitySearch(Address searchCenter, Boolean isDistanceBased, Integer number, UnitOfDistance unitOfDistance)
      Sets up a proximity search on Users. The following is an example rule which shows how to assign a user to an Activity by a simple proximity search: 
       uses gw.api.geocode.GeocodeScriptHelper;

 var usc = GeocodeScriptHelper.setupUserProximitySearch( Activity.Claimant.PrimaryAddress, false, 5 );
 usc.Username="b";

 if (Activity.CurrentAssignment.assignUserByProximityWithSearchCriteria( usc, -1, true )) {
   LOGGER.info("#### Assigning by proximity to Claimant Address = " + Activity.Claimant.PrimaryAddress);
   LOGGER.info( "Assigned User is " + activity.AssignedUser);
   actions.exit();
 }
      Parameters:
      searchCenter - The location to search for proximity from, an Address
      isDistanceBased - Set for true if a distance based ("search within n miles/km") search; false for an ordinal ("nearest n") search
      number - Range in miles/km for distance based searches; number of results to be returned for an ordinal search
      unitOfDistance - For distance based searches, indicates the unit to be used for the search range; for ordinal searches, indicates what unit should be used for results (UnitOfDistance.TC_KILOMETER or UnitOfDistance.TC_MILE)
      Returns:
      a UserSearchCriteriaBase upon which other criteria can be set if desired.

    • setupContactCenterProximitySearch

      public static ContactSearchCriteria setupContactCenterProximitySearch(String subtypeCode, Address searchCenter, Boolean isDistanceBased, Integer number)
      Sets up a proximity search on Contacts from ContactManager.
      Parameters:
      subtypeCode - The code for the contact subtype to be searched for
      searchCenter - The location to search for proximity from, an Address
      isDistanceBased - Set for true if a distance based ("search within n miles/km") search; false for an ordinal ("nearest n") search
      number - Range in miles/km for distance based searches; number of results to be returned for an ordinal search
      Returns:
      a ContactSearchCriteria upon which other criteria can be set if desired.

      searchCenter - The location to search for proximity from, an Address

      a ContactSearchCriteria upon which other criteria can be set if desired.

    • setupContactCenterProximitySearch

      public static ContactSearchCriteria setupContactCenterProximitySearch(Contact subtype, Address searchCenter, Boolean isDistanceBased, Integer number, UnitOfDistance unitOfDistance)
      Sets up a proximity search on Contacts from ContactManager.

      subtype - The contact subtype to be searched for
      searchCenter - The location to search for proximity from, an Address
      isDistanceBased - Set for true if a distance based ("search within n miles/km") search; false for an ordinal ("nearest n") search
      number - Range in miles/km for distance based searches; number of results to be returned for an ordinal search
      unitOfDistance - For distance based searches, indicates the unit to be used for the search range; for ordinal searches, indicates what unit should be used for results (UnitOfDistance.TC_KILOMETER or UnitOfDistance.TC_MILE)
      Returns:
      a ContactSearchCriteria upon which other criteria can be set if desired.

    • setupContactCenterProximitySearch

      public static ContactSearchCriteria setupContactCenterProximitySearch(String subtypeCode, Address searchCenter, Boolean isDistanceBased, Integer number, UnitOfDistance unitOfDistance)
      Sets up a proximity search on Contacts from ContactManager. The following is an example rule which shows how to add a preferred repair shop to new claims, searching by proximity: 
       uses java.lang.RuntimeException;
 uses gw.api.geocode.GeocodeScriptHelper;

 LOGGER.info("#### Searching for preferred Repair Shop by proximity to Loss Address = " + claim.LossLocation);
 var criteria = GeocodeScriptHelper.setupContactCenterProximitySearch( "AutoRepairShop", claim.LossLocation, true, 10, UnitOfDistance.TC_MILE);

 criteria.PreferredVendors = true;

 try {
   var cwtis = GeocodeScriptHelper.getResultsFromContactCenter( criteria, 20 ) ;
   if (cwtis.length > 0) {
     var internalRepairShop = GeocodeScriptHelper.makeLocalContact( cwtis[0], claim );
     claim.addRole(ContactRoleConstants.TC_REPAIRSHOP, internalRepairShop);
     LOGGER.info( "Added Repair Shop: " + cwtis[0])
   } else {
     LOGGER.info( "No preferred repair shop within 10 miles");
   }
 } catch (e) {
   LOGGER.info( "Address '"+claim.LossLocation+"' could not be used as the center of a proximity search:" + e.getMessage());;
 }
      Parameters:
      subtypeCode - The code for the contact subtype to be searched for
      searchCenter - The location to search for proximity from, an Address
      isDistanceBased - Set for true if a distance based ("search within n miles/km") search; false for an ordinal ("nearest n") search
      number - Range in miles/km for distance based searches; number of results to be returned for an ordinal search
      unitOfDistance - For distance based searches, indicates the unit to be used for the search range; for ordinal searches, indicates what unit should be used for results (UnitOfDistance.TC_KILOMETER or UnitOfDistance.TC_MILE)
      Returns:
      a ContactSearchCriteria upon which other criteria can be set if desired.

    • geocode

      public static Address geocode(Address address)
      Synchronously Geocodes an existing Address (persistent or non-persistent) if it has not already been Geocoded. If the original bean was already Geocoded, the original bean will be returned unmodified. If the original bean was not Geocoded, it will be Geocoded. If Geocoding fails, its GeocodeStatus will be set to FAILURE and a RunTimeException will be thrown. If Geocoding succeeds, then the Geocode fields (Geocode Status, and SpatialPoint) will be set on the original bean provided. A new Addresss will be created storing the address as corrected by the Geocoding service.
      Parameters:
      address - the original bean to Geocode.
      Returns:
      either a corrected version of that address or the original address.

    • getNumResultsFromContactCenter

      public static Integer getNumResultsFromContactCenter(ContactSearchCriteria criteria)
      Retrieves the number of search results findable in Contact Center.
      Parameters:
      criteria - the Contact Search criteria to search on. Should be set up using setupContactCenterProximitySearch
      Returns:
      The number of matching search results from Contact Center.

    • getResultsFromUsers

      public static User[] getResultsFromUsers(UserSearchCriteria usc)
      Retrieves ALL search results from the set of users. This can have a very negative performance impact if a large number of results are returned: use one of the other versions with "numResultsToReturn" set to a reasonably positive value whenever possible.
      Parameters:
      usc - the User Search criteria to search on. Should be set up using setupUserProximitySearch
      Returns:
      an array of User objects containing the results. May be an empty array if no results are found.

    • getResultsFromUsers

      public static User[] getResultsFromUsers(UserSearchCriteria usc, Integer numResultsToReturn)
      Retrieves search results from the set of users. Defaults to results starting from the row 0.
      Parameters:
      usc - the User Search criteria to search on. Should be set up using setupUserProximitySearch
      numResultsToReturn - If this is negative, return all results; it is strongly recommended, however, that you limit the number of results returned.
      Returns:
      an array of User(Base) objects containing the results. May be an empty array if no results are found.

    • getResultsFromUsers

      public static User[] getResultsFromUsers(UserSearchCriteria usc, Integer startRow, Integer numResultsToReturn)
      Retrieves search results from the set of users.
      Parameters:
      usc - the User Search criteria to search on. Should be set up using setupUserProximitySearch
      startRow - the first row to select; normally 0, unless you are paging.
      numResultsToReturn - If this is negative, return all results; it is strongly recommended, however, that you limit the number of results returned.
      Returns:
      an array of User(Base) objects containing the results. May be an empty array if no results are found.

    • getResultsFromContactCenter

      public static Contact[] getResultsFromContactCenter(ContactSearchCriteria criteria)
      Retrieves ALL search results from Contact Center.

      This can have a very negative performance impact if a large number of results are returned: use one of the other versions with "numResultsToReturn" set to a reasonably positive value whenever possible.

      Parameters:
      criteria - the Contact Search criteria to search on. Should be set up using setupContactCenterProximitySearch
      Returns:
      an array of User(Base) objects containing the results. May be an empty array if no results are found.

    • getResultsFromContactCenter

      public static Contact[] getResultsFromContactCenter(ContactSearchCriteria criteria, Integer numResultsToReturn)
      Retrieves search results from Contact Center. Defaults to results starting from the row 0.
      Parameters:
      criteria - the Contact Search criteria to search on. Should be set up using setupContactCenterProximitySearch
      numResultsToReturn - If this is negative, return all results; it is strongly recommended, however, that you limit the number of results returned.
      Returns:
      an array of User(Base) objects containing the results. May be an empty array if no results are found.

    • getResultsFromContactCenter

      public static Contact[] getResultsFromContactCenter(ContactSearchCriteria criteria, Integer startRow, Integer numResultsToReturn)
      Retrieves search results from Contact Center.
      Parameters:
      criteria - the Contact Search criteria to search on. Should be set up using setupContactCenterProximitySearch
      startRow - the first row to select; normally 0, unless you are paging.
      numResultsToReturn - If this is negative, return all results; it is strongly recommended, however, that you limit the number of results returned.
      Returns:
      an array of User(Base) objects containing the results. May be an empty array if no results are found.

    • categorizeGeocodeStatus

      public static ProximitySearchStatus categorizeGeocodeStatus(GeocodeStatus status)
      This function categorize the geocode status according to the descriptions defined in tl_pl_contact.xml.
      Parameters:
      status - - Geocode status
      Returns:
      One of the ProximitySearchStatus for the given geocode status

    • makeLocalContact

      public static Contact makeLocalContact(Contact addressBookContact, BundleProvider context)
      This copies an external Contact (ie, from the Contact Center plugin, having an external id) to a new local contact that can be persisted to the local database. Use with caution.
      Parameters:
      addressBookContact - the external contact to copy.
      context - a Bundle Provider (generally a Keyable Bean) existing in a writeable bundle; the new Contact will be created in this bundle.
      Returns:
      the new local contact copied

    • geocodeableToString

      public static String geocodeableToString(Address center)
      Deprecated.
      this is not localized, just use the Address's display name
      Returns a human-readable string representing an address in a standard format
      Parameters:
      center - an address
      Returns:
      a human-readable string representing that address

    • getDefaultUnitOfDistance

      public static UnitOfDistance getDefaultUnitOfDistance()
      Returns the system default unit of distance.
      Returns:
      a UnitOfDistance typekey indicating the system default unit of distance.
